timed.title: Timed
timed.info: Set your time-based prices for subscribing to this datastream.
timed.subsInfo: Enter an amount of units, the duration, and the price for that number of units.
timed.subsRatioInfo: The amount of the selected base token determines the value of the datatoken.
timed.rowInfo: Rows that are incomplete will be dropped.
timed.time: Define when buyers should be able to subscribe to the datastream again after the initial subscribtion.

tooltips.communityFee: Goes to Ocean DAO for teams to improve the tools, build apps, do outreach, and more. A small fraction is used to burn OCEAN. This fee is collected when downloading or using an asset in a compute job.
tooltips.marketplaceFee: Goes to the marketplace owner that is hosting and providing the marketplace and is collected when downloading or using an asset in a compute job. In Ocean Market, it is treated as network revenue that goes to the Ocean community.

duration.title: Timeout
duration.help: Define when buyers should be able to subscribe to the datastream again after the initial subscribtion.

fixed.title: Fixed
fixed.info: Set your price for accessing this asset. The datatoken for this asset will be worth the entered amount of the selected base token.

tooltips.communityFee: Goes to Ocean DAO for teams to improve the tools, build apps, do outreach, and more. A small fraction is used to burn OCEAN. This fee is collected when downloading or using an asset in a compute job.
tooltips.marketplaceFee: Goes to the marketplace owner that is hosting and providing the marketplace and is collected when downloading or using an asset in a compute job. In Ocean Market, it is treated as network revenue that goes to the Ocean community.

free.title: Free
free.info: Set your asset to free. The datatoken for this asset will be provided for free via a faucet.

fields.name: freeAgreement
options: I want this asset to be free. I understand network fees are still to be paid.

tooltips.approveSpecific: Give the smart contract permission to spend your COIN which has to be done for each transaction. You can optionally set this to infinite in your user preferences.
tooltips.approveInfinite: Give the smart contract permission to spend infinite amounts of your COIN so you have to do this only once. You can disable allowing infinite amounts in your user preferences.
